edu.ohiou.labimp.gtk3d
Class Gtk

java.lang.Object
  edu.ohiou.labimp.gtk3d.Gtk

public class Gtk
extends java.lang.Object

this class provide utility methods for geometric computations that are not available in Java3d package All methods in a class are static.

add

public static java.awt.Dimension add(java.awt.Dimension member1,
                                     java.awt.Dimension member2,
                                     int mode)
Adds two Dimension objects to create new object Metod accepts tow Dimension objects and returns new Dimension objects with added values - Dimension (w,h) way of computaiton is defined by mode: HEIGHT : w = max (w1 + w2), h = h1 + h2 WIDTH : w = w1 + w2, h = max (h1, h2) WIDTH_HEIGHT : w = w1 + w2, h = h1 + h2

Parameters:
mamber1 - - first element to be added
member2 - second element to be added
mode - - defines how to add members
Returns:
added Dimension (w,h)

computeTransformMatrix

public static javax.vecmath.Matrix4d computeTransformMatrix(javax.vecmath.Vector3d ptVec)
Method to compute transformation matrix for a given vector Supplied vector is new Z axis, new X axis or orthogonal to old Y axis

Parameters:
ptVec - - Vector3d on which to perfrom transformation, this vector is new z axis
Returns:
Matrix4d - Matrix4d that represent transformatino matrix
